verses.verse: <S%H3101>Joash<s%> was <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>. His <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> also was <S%H6645>Zibiah<s%> of <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>.

And <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>.
And <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> for him <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%>; and he <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.
¶ And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> this, that <S%H3101>Joash<s%> was <S%H3820>minded<s%> to <S%H2318>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And he gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, Go <S%H3318>out<s%> unto the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H6908>gather<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1767>from<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H8141>year<s%>, and see that ye <S%H4116>hasten<s%> the <S%H1697>matter<s%>. Howbeit the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H4116>hastened<s%> it not.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Why hast thou not <S%H1875>required<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to bring <S%H935>in<s%> out of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and out of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%H4864>collection<s%>, according to the commandment of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and of the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, for the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H5715>witness<s%>?

For the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%>, that <S%H4849>wicked<s%> woman, had broken <S%H6555>up<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>; and also all the dedicated <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> did they <S%H6213>bestow<s%> upon <S%H1168>Baalim<s%>.

And at the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H559>commandment<s%> they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H727>chest<s%>, and <S%H5414>set<s%> it <S%H2351>without<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>made<s%> a <S%H6963>proclamation<s%> through <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, to bring <S%H935>in<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H4864>collection<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> laid upon <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

And all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%>, and brought <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> into the <S%H727>chest<s%>, until they had made an <S%H3615>end<s%>.

Now it came to pass, that at what <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H727>chest<s%> was <S%H935>brought<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6486>office<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%>, the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5608>scribe<s%> and the <S%H7218>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest's<s%> <S%H6496>officer<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6168>emptied<s%> the <S%H727>chest<s%>, and <S%H5375>took<s%> it, and <S%H7725>carried<s%> it to his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>. Thus they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to such as <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H7936>hired<s%> <S%H2672>masons<s%> and <S%H2796>carpenters<s%> to <S%H2318>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and also such as <S%H2796>wrought<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> and <S%H5178>brass<s%> to <S%H2388>mend<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

So the <S%H4399%H6213>workmen<s%> <S%H6213>wrought<s%>, and the <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H5927>was<s%> <S%H724>perfected<s%> by <S%H3027>them<s%>, and they <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in his <S%H4971>state<s%>, and <S%H553>strengthened<s%> it.

And when they had <S%H3615>finished<s%> it, they <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%>, whereof were <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, even <S%H3627>vessels<s%> to <S%H8335>minister<s%>, and to <S%H5927>offer<s%> withal, and <S%H3709>spoons<s%>, and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%>. And they <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%>.

¶ But <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> waxed <S%H2204>old<s%>, and was <S%H7646>full<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> when he <S%H4191>died<s%>; an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> was he when he <S%H4194>died<s%>.

And they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> among the <S%H4428>kings<s%>, because he had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, both toward <S%H430>God<s%>, and toward his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Now <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and made <S%H7812>obeisance<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>. Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto them.

And they <S%H5800>left<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H842>groves<s%> and <S%H6091>idols<s%>: and <S%H7110>wrath<s%> came upon <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for this their <S%H819>trespass<s%>.

Yet he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%> to them, to bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and they <S%H5749>testified<s%> against them: but they would not give <S%H238>ear<s%>.

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3847>came<s%> upon <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, which <S%H5975>stood<s%> above the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, Why <S%H5674>transgress<s%> ye the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that ye cannot <S%H6743>prosper<s%>? because ye have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, he hath also <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> you.

And they <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against him, and <S%H7275>stoned<s%> him with <S%H68>stones<s%> at the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Thus <S%H3101>Joash<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> not the <S%H2617>kindness<s%> which <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to him, but <S%H2026>slew<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>. And when he <S%H4194>died<s%>, he <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> upon it, and <S%H1875>require<s%> it.

¶ And it came to pass at the <S%H8622>end<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%>, that the <S%H2428>host<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> against him: and they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> from among the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> all the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of them unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>.

For the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with a <S%H4705>small<s%> company of <S%H582>men<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H2428>host<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, because they had <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>. So they <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8201>judgment<s%> against <S%H3101>Joash<s%>.

And when they were <S%H3212>departed<s%> from him, (for they <S%H5800>left<s%> him in <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4251>diseases<s%>,) his own <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against him for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> him on his <S%H4296>bed<s%>, and he <S%H4191>died<s%>: and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, but they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him not in the <S%H6913>sepulchres<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%>.

And these are they that <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against him; <S%H2066>Zabad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8100>Shimeath<s%> an <S%H5985>Ammonitess<s%>, and <S%H3075>Jehozabad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8116>Shimrith<s%> a <S%H4125>Moabitess<s%>.

¶ Now concerning his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and the <S%H7235%H7230>greatness<s%> of the <S%H4853>burdens<s%> laid upon him, and the <S%H3247>repairing<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, behold, they are <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H4097>story<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%>. And <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his stead.
